14 //*****************************************************************************
15 //
16 // If building with a C++ compiler, make all of the definitions in this header
17 // have a C binding.

19 //*****************************************************************************
20 #ifdef __cplusplus
21 extern "C"

23 #endif
24 
25 #include "inc/hw_memmap.h"
26 //*****************************************************************************
27 //
28 //! \brief Used in the EUSCI_B_I2C_initMaster() function as the param
29 //! parameter.
30 //
31 //*****************************************************************************
32 typedef struct EUSCI_B_I2C_initMasterParam {
33  //! Selects the clocksource. Refer to device specific datasheet for
34  //! available options.
35  //! \n Valid values are:
36  //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_CLOCKSOURCE_ACLK
37  //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_CLOCKSOURCE_SMCLK
38  uint8_t selectClockSource;
39  //! Is the rate of the clock supplied to the I2C module (the frequency in
40  //! Hz of the clock source specified in selectClockSource).
41  uint32_t i2cClk;
42  //! Setup for selecting data transfer rate.
43  //! \n Valid values are:
44  //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_SET_DATA_RATE_400KBPS
45  //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_SET_DATA_RATE_100KBPS
46  uint32_t dataRate;
47  //! Sets threshold for automatic STOP or UCSTPIFG
48  uint8_t byteCounterThreshold;
49  //! Sets up the STOP condition generation.
50  //! \n Valid values are:
51  //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_NO_AUTO_STOP
52  //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_SET_BYTECOUNT_THRESHOLD_FLAG
53  //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_SEND_STOP_AUTOMATICALLY_ON_BYTECOUNT_THRESHOLD
54  uint8_t autoSTOPGeneration;
55 } EUSCI_B_I2C_initMasterParam;
56 
57 //*****************************************************************************
58 //
59 //! \brief Used in the EUSCI_B_I2C_initSlave() function as the param parameter.
60 //
61 //*****************************************************************************
62 typedef struct EUSCI_B_I2C_initSlaveParam {
63  //! 7-bit slave address
64  uint8_t slaveAddress;
65  //! Own address Offset referred to- 'x' value of UCBxI2COAx.
66  //! \n Valid values are:
67  //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_OWN_ADDRESS_OFFSET0
68  //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_OWN_ADDRESS_OFFSET1
69  //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_OWN_ADDRESS_OFFSET2
70  //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_OWN_ADDRESS_OFFSET3
71  uint8_t slaveAddressOffset;
72  //! Selects if the specified address is enabled or disabled.
73  //! \n Valid values are:
74  //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_OWN_ADDRESS_DISABLE
75  //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_OWN_ADDRESS_ENABLE
76  uint32_t slaveOwnAddressEnable;
77 } EUSCI_B_I2C_initSlaveParam;
78 
79 
80 //*****************************************************************************
81 //
82 // The following are values that can be passed to the param parameter for
83 // functions: EUSCI_B_I2C_initMaster().
84 //
85 //*****************************************************************************
86 #define EUSCI_B_I2C_NO_AUTO_STOP UCASTP_0
87 #define EUSCI_B_I2C_SET_BYTECOUNT_THRESHOLD_FLAG UCASTP_1
88 #define EUSCI_B_I2C_SEND_STOP_AUTOMATICALLY_ON_BYTECOUNT_THRESHOLD UCASTP_2
89 
90 //*****************************************************************************
91 //
92 // The following are values that can be passed to the param parameter for
93 // functions: EUSCI_B_I2C_initMaster().
94 //
95 //*****************************************************************************
96 #define EUSCI_B_I2C_SET_DATA_RATE_400KBPS 400000
97 #define EUSCI_B_I2C_SET_DATA_RATE_100KBPS 100000
98 
99 //*****************************************************************************
100 //
101 // The following are values that can be passed to the param parameter for
102 // functions: EUSCI_B_I2C_initMaster().
103 //
104 //*****************************************************************************
105 #define EUSCI_B_I2C_CLOCKSOURCE_ACLK UCSSEL__ACLK
106 #define EUSCI_B_I2C_CLOCKSOURCE_SMCLK UCSSEL__SMCLK
107 
108 //*****************************************************************************
109 //
110 // The following are values that can be passed to the param parameter for
111 // functions: EUSCI_B_I2C_initSlave().
112 //
113 //*****************************************************************************
114 #define EUSCI_B_I2C_OWN_ADDRESS_OFFSET0 0x00
115 #define EUSCI_B_I2C_OWN_ADDRESS_OFFSET1 0x02
116 #define EUSCI_B_I2C_OWN_ADDRESS_OFFSET2 0x04
117 #define EUSCI_B_I2C_OWN_ADDRESS_OFFSET3 0x06
118 
119 //*****************************************************************************
120 //
121 // The following are values that can be passed to the param parameter for
122 // functions: EUSCI_B_I2C_initSlave().
123 //
124 //*****************************************************************************
125 #define EUSCI_B_I2C_OWN_ADDRESS_DISABLE 0x00
126 #define EUSCI_B_I2C_OWN_ADDRESS_ENABLE UCOAEN
127 
128 //*****************************************************************************
129 //
130 // The following are values that can be passed to the mode parameter for
131 // functions: EUSCI_B_I2C_setMode() as well as returned by the
132 // EUSCI_B_I2C_getMode() function.
133 //
134 //*****************************************************************************
135 #define EUSCI_B_I2C_TRANSMIT_MODE UCTR
136 #define EUSCI_B_I2C_RECEIVE_MODE 0x00
137 
138 //*****************************************************************************
139 //
140 // The following are values that can be passed to the mask parameter for
141 // functions: EUSCI_B_I2C_enableInterrupt(), EUSCI_B_I2C_disableInterrupt(),
142 // EUSCI_B_I2C_clearInterrupt(), and EUSCI_B_I2C_getInterruptStatus() as well
143 // as returned by the EUSCI_B_I2C_getInterruptStatus() function.
144 //
145 //*****************************************************************************
146 #define EUSCI_B_I2C_NAK_INTERRUPT UCNACKIE
147 #define EUSCI_B_I2C_ARBITRATIONLOST_INTERRUPT UCALIE
148 #define EUSCI_B_I2C_STOP_INTERRUPT UCSTPIE
149 #define EUSCI_B_I2C_START_INTERRUPT UCSTTIE
150 #define EUSCI_B_I2C_TRANSMIT_INTERRUPT0 UCTXIE0
151 #define EUSCI_B_I2C_TRANSMIT_INTERRUPT1 UCTXIE1
152 #define EUSCI_B_I2C_TRANSMIT_INTERRUPT2 UCTXIE2
153 #define EUSCI_B_I2C_TRANSMIT_INTERRUPT3 UCTXIE3
154 #define EUSCI_B_I2C_RECEIVE_INTERRUPT0 UCRXIE0
155 #define EUSCI_B_I2C_RECEIVE_INTERRUPT1 UCRXIE1
156 #define EUSCI_B_I2C_RECEIVE_INTERRUPT2 UCRXIE2
157 #define EUSCI_B_I2C_RECEIVE_INTERRUPT3 UCRXIE3
158 #define EUSCI_B_I2C_BIT9_POSITION_INTERRUPT UCBIT9IE
159 #define EUSCI_B_I2C_CLOCK_LOW_TIMEOUT_INTERRUPT UCCLTOIE
160 #define EUSCI_B_I2C_BYTE_COUNTER_INTERRUPT UCBCNTIE
161 
162 //*****************************************************************************
163 //
164 // The following are values that can be passed toThe following are values that
165 // can be returned by the EUSCI_B_I2C_isBusBusy() function.
166 //
167 //*****************************************************************************
168 #define EUSCI_B_I2C_BUS_BUSY UCBBUSY
169 #define EUSCI_B_I2C_BUS_NOT_BUSY 0x00
170 
171 //*****************************************************************************
172 //
173 // The following are values that can be passed toThe following are values that
174 // can be returned by the EUSCI_B_I2C_masterIsStopSent() function.
175 //
176 //*****************************************************************************
177 #define EUSCI_B_I2C_STOP_SEND_COMPLETE 0x00
178 #define EUSCI_B_I2C_SENDING_STOP UCTXSTP
179 
180 //*****************************************************************************
181 //
182 // The following are values that can be passed toThe following are values that
183 // can be returned by the EUSCI_B_I2C_masterIsStartSent() function.
184 //
185 //*****************************************************************************
186 #define EUSCI_B_I2C_START_SEND_COMPLETE 0x00
187 #define EUSCI_B_I2C_SENDING_START UCTXSTT
188 
189 //*****************************************************************************
190 //
191 // Prototypes for the APIs.
192 //
193 //*****************************************************************************
194 
195 //*****************************************************************************
196 //
197 //! \brief Initializes the I2C Master block.
198 //!
199 //! This function initializes operation of the I2C Master block. Upon
200 //! successful initialization of the I2C block, this function will have set the
201 //! bus speed for the master; however I2C module is still disabled till
202 //! EUSCI_B_I2C_enable is invoked.
203 //!
204 //! \param baseAddress is the base address of the I2C Master module.
205 //! \param param is the pointer to the struct for master initialization.
206 //!
207 //! \return None
208 //
209 //*****************************************************************************
210 extern void EUSCI_B_I2C_initMaster(uint16_t baseAddress,
211  EUSCI_B_I2C_initMasterParam *param);
212 
213 //*****************************************************************************
214 //
215 //! \brief Initializes the I2C Slave block.
216 //!
217 //! This function initializes operation of the I2C as a Slave mode. Upon
218 //! successful initialization of the I2C blocks, this function will have set
219 //! the slave address but the I2C module is still disabled till
220 //! EUSCI_B_I2C_enable is invoked.
221 //!
222 //! \param baseAddress is the base address of the I2C Slave module.
223 //! \param param is the pointer to the struct for slave initialization.
224 //!
225 //! \return None
226 //
227 //*****************************************************************************
228 extern void EUSCI_B_I2C_initSlave(uint16_t baseAddress,
229  EUSCI_B_I2C_initSlaveParam *param);
230 
231 //*****************************************************************************
232 //
233 //! \brief Enables the I2C block.
234 //!
235 //! This will enable operation of the I2C block.
236 //!
237 //! \param baseAddress is the base address of the USCI I2C module.
238 //!
239 //! Modified bits are \b UCSWRST of \b UCBxCTLW0 register.
240 //!
241 //! \return None
242 //
243 //*****************************************************************************
244 extern void EUSCI_B_I2C_enable(uint16_t baseAddress);
245 
246 //*****************************************************************************
247 //
248 //! \brief Disables the I2C block.
249 //!
250 //! This will disable operation of the I2C block.
251 //!
252 //! \param baseAddress is the base address of the USCI I2C module.
253 //!
254 //! Modified bits are \b UCSWRST of \b UCBxCTLW0 register.
255 //!
256 //! \return None
257 //
258 //*****************************************************************************
259 extern void EUSCI_B_I2C_disable(uint16_t baseAddress);
260 
261 //*****************************************************************************
262 //
263 //! \brief Sets the address that the I2C Master will place on the bus.
264 //!
265 //! This function will set the address that the I2C Master will place on the
266 //! bus when initiating a transaction.
267 //!
268 //! \param baseAddress is the base address of the USCI I2C module.
269 //! \param slaveAddress 7-bit slave address
270 //!
271 //! Modified bits of \b UCBxI2CSA register.
272 //!
273 //! \return None
274 //
275 //*****************************************************************************
276 extern void EUSCI_B_I2C_setSlaveAddress(uint16_t baseAddress,
277  uint8_t slaveAddress);
278 
279 //*****************************************************************************
280 //
281 //! \brief Sets the mode of the I2C device
282 //!
283 //! When the receive parameter is set to EUSCI_B_I2C_TRANSMIT_MODE, the address
284 //! will indicate that the I2C module is in receive mode; otherwise, the I2C
285 //! module is in send mode.
286 //!
287 //! \param baseAddress is the base address of the USCI I2C module.
288 //! \param mode Mode for the EUSCI_B_I2C module
289 //! Valid values are:
290 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_TRANSMIT_MODE [Default]
291 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_RECEIVE_MODE
292 //!
293 //! Modified bits are \b UCTR of \b UCBxCTLW0 register.
294 //!
295 //! \return None
296 //
297 //*****************************************************************************
298 extern void EUSCI_B_I2C_setMode(uint16_t baseAddress,
299  uint8_t mode);
300 
301 //*****************************************************************************
302 //
303 //! \brief Gets the mode of the I2C device
304 //!
305 //! Current I2C transmit/receive mode.
306 //!
307 //! \param baseAddress is the base address of the I2C module.
308 //!
309 //! Modified bits are \b UCTR of \b UCBxCTLW0 register.
310 //!
311 //! \return One of the following:
312 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_TRANSMIT_MODE
313 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_RECEIVE_MODE
314 //! \n indicating the current mode
315 //
316 //*****************************************************************************
317 extern uint8_t EUSCI_B_I2C_getMode(uint16_t baseAddress);
318 
319 //*****************************************************************************
320 //
321 //! \brief Transmits a byte from the I2C Module.
322 //!
323 //! This function will place the supplied data into I2C transmit data register
324 //! to start transmission.
325 //!
326 //! \param baseAddress is the base address of the I2C Slave module.
327 //! \param transmitData data to be transmitted from the I2C module
328 //!
329 //! Modified bits of \b UCBxTXBUF register.
330 //!
331 //! \return None
332 //
333 //*****************************************************************************
334 extern void EUSCI_B_I2C_slavePutData(uint16_t baseAddress,
335  uint8_t transmitData);
336 
337 //*****************************************************************************
338 //
339 //! \brief Receives a byte that has been sent to the I2C Module.
340 //!
341 //! This function reads a byte of data from the I2C receive data Register.
342 //!
343 //! \param baseAddress is the base address of the I2C Slave module.
344 //!
345 //! \return Returns the byte received from by the I2C module, cast as an
346 //! uint8_t.
347 //
348 //*****************************************************************************
349 extern uint8_t EUSCI_B_I2C_slaveGetData(uint16_t baseAddress);
350 
351 //*****************************************************************************
352 //
353 //! \brief Indicates whether or not the I2C bus is busy.
354 //!
355 //! This function returns an indication of whether or not the I2C bus is busy.
356 //! This function checks the status of the bus via UCBBUSY bit in UCBxSTAT
357 //! register.
358 //!
359 //! \param baseAddress is the base address of the I2C module.
360 //!
361 //! \return One of the following:
362 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_BUS_BUSY
363 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_BUS_NOT_BUSY
364 //! \n indicating whether the bus is busy
365 //
366 //*****************************************************************************
367 extern uint16_t EUSCI_B_I2C_isBusBusy(uint16_t baseAddress);
368 
369 //*****************************************************************************
370 //
371 //! \brief Indicates whether STOP got sent.
372 //!
373 //! This function returns an indication of whether or not STOP got sent This
374 //! function checks the status of the bus via UCTXSTP bit in UCBxCTL1 register.
375 //!
376 //! \param baseAddress is the base address of the I2C Master module.
377 //!
378 //! \return One of the following:
379 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_STOP_SEND_COMPLETE
380 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_SENDING_STOP
381 //! \n indicating whether the stop was sent
382 //
383 //*****************************************************************************
384 extern uint16_t EUSCI_B_I2C_masterIsStopSent(uint16_t baseAddress);
385 
386 //*****************************************************************************
387 //
388 //! \brief Indicates whether Start got sent.
389 //!
390 //! This function returns an indication of whether or not Start got sent This
391 //! function checks the status of the bus via UCTXSTT bit in UCBxCTL1 register.
392 //!
393 //! \param baseAddress is the base address of the I2C Master module.
394 //!
395 //! \return One of the following:
396 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_START_SEND_COMPLETE
397 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_SENDING_START
398 //! \n indicating whether the start was sent
399 //
400 //*****************************************************************************
401 extern uint16_t EUSCI_B_I2C_masterIsStartSent(uint16_t baseAddress);
402 
403 //*****************************************************************************
404 //
405 //! \brief Enables individual I2C interrupt sources.
406 //!
407 //! Enables the indicated I2C interrupt sources. Only the sources that are
408 //! enabled can be reflected to the processor interrupt; disabled sources have
409 //! no effect on the processor.
410 //!
411 //! \param baseAddress is the base address of the I2C module.
412 //! \param mask is the bit mask of the interrupt sources to be enabled.
413 //! Mask value is the logical OR of any of the following:
414 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_NAK_INTERRUPT - Not-acknowledge interrupt
415 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_ARBITRATIONLOST_INTERRUPT - Arbitration lost
416 //! interrupt
417 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_STOP_INTERRUPT - STOP condition interrupt
418 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_START_INTERRUPT - START condition interrupt
419 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_TRANSMIT_INTERRUPT0 - Transmit interrupt0
420 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_TRANSMIT_INTERRUPT1 - Transmit interrupt1
421 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_TRANSMIT_INTERRUPT2 - Transmit interrupt2
422 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_TRANSMIT_INTERRUPT3 - Transmit interrupt3
423 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_RECEIVE_INTERRUPT0 - Receive interrupt0
424 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_RECEIVE_INTERRUPT1 - Receive interrupt1
425 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_RECEIVE_INTERRUPT2 - Receive interrupt2
426 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_RECEIVE_INTERRUPT3 - Receive interrupt3
427 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_BIT9_POSITION_INTERRUPT - Bit position 9 interrupt
428 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_CLOCK_LOW_TIMEOUT_INTERRUPT - Clock low timeout
429 //! interrupt enable
430 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_BYTE_COUNTER_INTERRUPT - Byte counter interrupt
431 //! enable
432 //!
433 //! Modified bits of \b UCBxIE register.
434 //!
435 //! \return None
436 //
437 //*****************************************************************************
438 extern void EUSCI_B_I2C_enableInterrupt(uint16_t baseAddress,
439  uint16_t mask);
440 
441 //*****************************************************************************
442 //
443 //! \brief Disables individual I2C interrupt sources.
444 //!
445 //! Disables the indicated I2C interrupt sources. Only the sources that are
446 //! enabled can be reflected to the processor interrupt; disabled sources have
447 //! no effect on the processor.
448 //!
449 //! \param baseAddress is the base address of the I2C module.
450 //! \param mask is the bit mask of the interrupt sources to be disabled.
451 //! Mask value is the logical OR of any of the following:
452 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_NAK_INTERRUPT - Not-acknowledge interrupt
453 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_ARBITRATIONLOST_INTERRUPT - Arbitration lost
454 //! interrupt
455 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_STOP_INTERRUPT - STOP condition interrupt
456 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_START_INTERRUPT - START condition interrupt
457 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_TRANSMIT_INTERRUPT0 - Transmit interrupt0
458 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_TRANSMIT_INTERRUPT1 - Transmit interrupt1
459 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_TRANSMIT_INTERRUPT2 - Transmit interrupt2
460 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_TRANSMIT_INTERRUPT3 - Transmit interrupt3
461 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_RECEIVE_INTERRUPT0 - Receive interrupt0
462 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_RECEIVE_INTERRUPT1 - Receive interrupt1
463 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_RECEIVE_INTERRUPT2 - Receive interrupt2
464 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_RECEIVE_INTERRUPT3 - Receive interrupt3
465 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_BIT9_POSITION_INTERRUPT - Bit position 9 interrupt
466 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_CLOCK_LOW_TIMEOUT_INTERRUPT - Clock low timeout
467 //! interrupt enable
468 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_BYTE_COUNTER_INTERRUPT - Byte counter interrupt
469 //! enable
470 //!
471 //! Modified bits of \b UCBxIE register.
472 //!
473 //! \return None
474 //
475 //*****************************************************************************
476 extern void EUSCI_B_I2C_disableInterrupt(uint16_t baseAddress,
477  uint16_t mask);
478 
479 //*****************************************************************************
480 //
481 //! \brief Clears I2C interrupt sources.
482 //!
483 //! The I2C interrupt source is cleared, so that it no longer asserts. The
484 //! highest interrupt flag is automatically cleared when an interrupt vector
485 //! generator is used.
486 //!
487 //! \param baseAddress is the base address of the I2C module.
488 //! \param mask is a bit mask of the interrupt sources to be cleared.
489 //! Mask value is the logical OR of any of the following:
490 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_NAK_INTERRUPT - Not-acknowledge interrupt
491 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_ARBITRATIONLOST_INTERRUPT - Arbitration lost
492 //! interrupt
493 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_STOP_INTERRUPT - STOP condition interrupt
494 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_START_INTERRUPT - START condition interrupt
495 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_TRANSMIT_INTERRUPT0 - Transmit interrupt0
496 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_TRANSMIT_INTERRUPT1 - Transmit interrupt1
497 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_TRANSMIT_INTERRUPT2 - Transmit interrupt2
498 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_TRANSMIT_INTERRUPT3 - Transmit interrupt3
499 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_RECEIVE_INTERRUPT0 - Receive interrupt0
500 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_RECEIVE_INTERRUPT1 - Receive interrupt1
501 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_RECEIVE_INTERRUPT2 - Receive interrupt2
502 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_RECEIVE_INTERRUPT3 - Receive interrupt3
503 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_BIT9_POSITION_INTERRUPT - Bit position 9 interrupt
504 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_CLOCK_LOW_TIMEOUT_INTERRUPT - Clock low timeout
505 //! interrupt enable
506 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_BYTE_COUNTER_INTERRUPT - Byte counter interrupt
507 //! enable
508 //!
509 //! Modified bits of \b UCBxIFG register.
510 //!
511 //! \return None
512 //
513 //*****************************************************************************
514 extern void EUSCI_B_I2C_clearInterrupt(uint16_t baseAddress,
515  uint16_t mask);
516 
517 //*****************************************************************************
518 //
519 //! \brief Gets the current I2C interrupt status.
520 //!
521 //! This returns the interrupt status for the I2C module based on which flag is
522 //! passed.
523 //!
524 //! \param baseAddress is the base address of the I2C module.
525 //! \param mask is the masked interrupt flag status to be returned.
526 //! Mask value is the logical OR of any of the following:
527 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_NAK_INTERRUPT - Not-acknowledge interrupt
528 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_ARBITRATIONLOST_INTERRUPT - Arbitration lost
529 //! interrupt
530 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_STOP_INTERRUPT - STOP condition interrupt
531 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_START_INTERRUPT - START condition interrupt
532 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_TRANSMIT_INTERRUPT0 - Transmit interrupt0
533 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_TRANSMIT_INTERRUPT1 - Transmit interrupt1
534 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_TRANSMIT_INTERRUPT2 - Transmit interrupt2
535 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_TRANSMIT_INTERRUPT3 - Transmit interrupt3
536 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_RECEIVE_INTERRUPT0 - Receive interrupt0
537 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_RECEIVE_INTERRUPT1 - Receive interrupt1
538 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_RECEIVE_INTERRUPT2 - Receive interrupt2
539 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_RECEIVE_INTERRUPT3 - Receive interrupt3
540 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_BIT9_POSITION_INTERRUPT - Bit position 9 interrupt
541 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_CLOCK_LOW_TIMEOUT_INTERRUPT - Clock low timeout
542 //! interrupt enable
543 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_BYTE_COUNTER_INTERRUPT - Byte counter interrupt
544 //! enable
545 //!
546 //! \return Logical OR of any of the following:
547 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_NAK_INTERRUPT Not-acknowledge interrupt
548 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_ARBITRATIONLOST_INTERRUPT Arbitration lost
549 //! interrupt
550 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_STOP_INTERRUPT STOP condition interrupt
551 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_START_INTERRUPT START condition interrupt
552 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_TRANSMIT_INTERRUPT0 Transmit interrupt0
553 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_TRANSMIT_INTERRUPT1 Transmit interrupt1
554 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_TRANSMIT_INTERRUPT2 Transmit interrupt2
555 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_TRANSMIT_INTERRUPT3 Transmit interrupt3
556 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_RECEIVE_INTERRUPT0 Receive interrupt0
557 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_RECEIVE_INTERRUPT1 Receive interrupt1
558 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_RECEIVE_INTERRUPT2 Receive interrupt2
559 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_RECEIVE_INTERRUPT3 Receive interrupt3
560 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_BIT9_POSITION_INTERRUPT Bit position 9 interrupt
561 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_CLOCK_LOW_TIMEOUT_INTERRUPT Clock low timeout
562 //! interrupt enable
563 //! - \b EUSCI_B_I2C_BYTE_COUNTER_INTERRUPT Byte counter interrupt
564 //! enable
565 //! \n indicating the status of the masked interrupts
566 //
567 //*****************************************************************************
568 extern uint16_t EUSCI_B_I2C_getInterruptStatus(uint16_t baseAddress,
569  uint16_t mask);
570 
571 //*****************************************************************************
572 //
573 //! \brief Does single byte transmission from Master to Slave
574 //!
575 //! This function is used by the Master module to send a single byte. This
576 //! function sends a start, then transmits the byte to the slave and then sends
577 //! a stop.
578 //!
579 //! \param baseAddress is the base address of the I2C Master module.
580 //! \param txData is the data byte to be transmitted
581 //!
582 //! Modified bits of \b UCBxTXBUF register, bits of \b UCBxCTLW0 register, bits
583 //! of \b UCBxIE register and bits of \b UCBxIFG register.
584 //!
585 //! \return None
586 //
587 //*****************************************************************************
588 extern void EUSCI_B_I2C_masterSendSingleByte(uint16_t baseAddress,
589  uint8_t txData);
590 
591 //*****************************************************************************
592 //
593 //! \brief Does single byte reception from Slave
594 //!
595 //! This function is used by the Master module to receive a single byte. This
596 //! function sends start and stop, waits for data reception and then receives
597 //! the data from the slave
598 //!
599 //! \param baseAddress is the base address of the I2C Master module.
600 //!
601 //! Modified bits of \b UCBxTXBUF register, bits of \b UCBxCTLW0 register, bits
602 //! of \b UCBxIE register and bits of \b UCBxIFG register.
603 //!
604 //! \return STATUS_SUCCESS or STATUS_FAILURE of the transmission process.
605 //
606 //*****************************************************************************
607 extern uint8_t EUSCI_B_I2C_masterReceiveSingleByte(uint16_t baseAddress);
608 
609 //*****************************************************************************
610 //
611 //! \brief Does single byte transmission from Master to Slave with timeout
612 //!
613 //! This function is used by the Master module to send a single byte. This
614 //! function sends a start, then transmits the byte to the slave and then sends
615 //! a stop.
616 //!
617 //! \param baseAddress is the base address of the I2C Master module.
618 //! \param txData is the data byte to be transmitted
619 //! \param timeout is the amount of time to wait until giving up
620 //!
621 //! Modified bits of \b UCBxTXBUF register, bits of \b UCBxCTLW0 register, bits
622 //! of \b UCBxIE register and bits of \b UCBxIFG register.
623 //!
624 //! \return STATUS_SUCCESS or STATUS_FAILURE of the transmission process.
625 //
626 //*****************************************************************************
627 extern bool EUSCI_B_I2C_masterSendSingleByteWithTimeout(uint16_t baseAddress,
628  uint8_t txData,
629  uint32_t timeout);
630 
631 //*****************************************************************************
632 //
633 //! \brief Starts multi-byte transmission from Master to Slave
634 //!
635 //! This function is used by the master module to start a multi byte
636 //! transaction.
637 //!
638 //! \param baseAddress is the base address of the I2C Master module.
639 //! \param txData is the first data byte to be transmitted
640 //!
641 //! Modified bits of \b UCBxTXBUF register, bits of \b UCBxCTLW0 register, bits
642 //! of \b UCBxIE register and bits of \b UCBxIFG register.
643 //!
644 //! \return None
645 //
646 //*****************************************************************************
647 extern void EUSCI_B_I2C_masterSendMultiByteStart(uint16_t baseAddress,
648  uint8_t txData);
649 
650 //*****************************************************************************
651 //
652 //! \brief Starts multi-byte transmission from Master to Slave with timeout
653 //!
654 //! This function is used by the master module to start a multi byte
655 //! transaction.
656 //!
657 //! \param baseAddress is the base address of the I2C Master module.
658 //! \param txData is the first data byte to be transmitted
659 //! \param timeout is the amount of time to wait until giving up
660 //!
661 //! Modified bits of \b UCBxTXBUF register, bits of \b UCBxCTLW0 register, bits
662 //! of \b UCBxIE register and bits of \b UCBxIFG register.
663 //!
664 //! \return STATUS_SUCCESS or STATUS_FAILURE of the transmission process.
665 //
666 //*****************************************************************************
667 extern bool EUSCI_B_I2C_masterSendMultiByteStartWithTimeout(uint16_t baseAddress,
668  uint8_t txData,
669  uint32_t timeout);
670 
671 //*****************************************************************************
672 //
673 //! \brief Continues multi-byte transmission from Master to Slave
674 //!
675 //! This function is used by the Master module continue each byte of a multi-
676 //! byte transmission. This function transmits each data byte of a multi-byte
677 //! transmission to the slave.
678 //!
679 //! \param baseAddress is the base address of the I2C Master module.
680 //! \param txData is the next data byte to be transmitted
681 //!
682 //! Modified bits of \b UCBxTXBUF register.
683 //!
684 //! \return None
685 //
686 //*****************************************************************************
687 extern void EUSCI_B_I2C_masterSendMultiByteNext(uint16_t baseAddress,
688  uint8_t txData);
689 
690 //*****************************************************************************
691 //
692 //! \brief Continues multi-byte transmission from Master to Slave with timeout
693 //!
694 //! This function is used by the Master module continue each byte of a multi-
695 //! byte transmission. This function transmits each data byte of a multi-byte
696 //! transmission to the slave.
697 //!
698 //! \param baseAddress is the base address of the I2C Master module.
699 //! \param txData is the next data byte to be transmitted
700 //! \param timeout is the amount of time to wait until giving up
701 //!
702 //! Modified bits of \b UCBxTXBUF register.
703 //!
704 //! \return STATUS_SUCCESS or STATUS_FAILURE of the transmission process.
705 //
706 //*****************************************************************************
707 extern bool EUSCI_B_I2C_masterSendMultiByteNextWithTimeout(uint16_t baseAddress,
708  uint8_t txData,
709  uint32_t timeout);
710 
711 //*****************************************************************************
712 //
713 //! \brief Finishes multi-byte transmission from Master to Slave
714 //!
715 //! This function is used by the Master module to send the last byte and STOP.
716 //! This function transmits the last data byte of a multi-byte transmission to
717 //! the slave and then sends a stop.
718 //!
719 //! \param baseAddress is the base address of the I2C Master module.
720 //! \param txData is the last data byte to be transmitted in a multi-byte
721 //! transmission
722 //!
723 //! Modified bits of \b UCBxTXBUF register and bits of \b UCBxCTLW0 register.
724 //!
725 //! \return None
726 //
727 //*****************************************************************************
728 extern void EUSCI_B_I2C_masterSendMultiByteFinish(uint16_t baseAddress,
729  uint8_t txData);
730 
731 //*****************************************************************************
732 //
733 //! \brief Finishes multi-byte transmission from Master to Slave with timeout
734 //!
735 //! This function is used by the Master module to send the last byte and STOP.
736 //! This function transmits the last data byte of a multi-byte transmission to
737 //! the slave and then sends a stop.
738 //!
739 //! \param baseAddress is the base address of the I2C Master module.
740 //! \param txData is the last data byte to be transmitted in a multi-byte
741 //! transmission
742 //! \param timeout is the amount of time to wait until giving up
743 //!
744 //! Modified bits of \b UCBxTXBUF register and bits of \b UCBxCTLW0 register.
745 //!
746 //! \return STATUS_SUCCESS or STATUS_FAILURE of the transmission process.
747 //
748 //*****************************************************************************
749 extern bool EUSCI_B_I2C_masterSendMultiByteFinishWithTimeout(uint16_t baseAddress,
750  uint8_t txData,
751  uint32_t timeout);
752 
753 //*****************************************************************************
754 //
755 //! \brief This function is used by the Master module to initiate START
756 //!
757 //! This function is used by the Master module to initiate START
758 //!
759 //! \param baseAddress is the base address of the I2C Master module.
760 //!
761 //! Modified bits are \b UCTXSTT of \b UCBxCTLW0 register.
762 //!
763 //! \return None
764 //
765 //*****************************************************************************
766 extern void EUSCI_B_I2C_masterSendStart(uint16_t baseAddress);
767 
768 //*****************************************************************************
769 //
770 //! \brief Send STOP byte at the end of a multi-byte transmission from Master
771 //! to Slave
772 //!
773 //! This function is used by the Master module send STOP at the end of a multi-
774 //! byte transmission. This function sends a stop after current transmission is
775 //! complete.
776 //!
777 //! \param baseAddress is the base address of the I2C Master module.
778 //!
779 //! Modified bits are \b UCTXSTP of \b UCBxCTLW0 register.
780 //!
781 //! \return None
782 //
783 //*****************************************************************************
784 extern void EUSCI_B_I2C_masterSendMultiByteStop(uint16_t baseAddress);
785 
786 //*****************************************************************************
787 //
788 //! \brief Send STOP byte at the end of a multi-byte transmission from Master
789 //! to Slave with timeout
790 //!
791 //! This function is used by the Master module send STOP at the end of a multi-
792 //! byte transmission. This function sends a stop after current transmission is
793 //! complete.
794 //!
795 //! \param baseAddress is the base address of the I2C Master module.
796 //! \param timeout is the amount of time to wait until giving up
797 //!
798 //! Modified bits are \b UCTXSTP of \b UCBxCTLW0 register.
799 //!
800 //! \return STATUS_SUCCESS or STATUS_FAILURE of the transmission process.
801 //
802 //*****************************************************************************
803 extern bool EUSCI_B_I2C_masterSendMultiByteStopWithTimeout(uint16_t baseAddress,
804  uint32_t timeout);
805 
806 //*****************************************************************************
807 //
808 //! \brief Starts reception at the Master end
809 //!
810 //! This function is used by the Master module initiate reception of a single
811 //! byte. This function sends a start.
812 //!
813 //! \param baseAddress is the base address of the I2C Master module.
814 //!
815 //! Modified bits are \b UCTXSTT of \b UCBxCTLW0 register.
816 //!
817 //! \return None
818 //
819 //*****************************************************************************
820 extern void EUSCI_B_I2C_masterReceiveStart(uint16_t baseAddress);
821 
822 //*****************************************************************************
823 //
824 //! \brief Starts multi-byte reception at the Master end one byte at a time
825 //!
826 //! This function is used by the Master module to receive each byte of a multi-
827 //! byte reception. This function reads currently received byte.
828 //!
829 //! \param baseAddress is the base address of the I2C Master module.
830 //!
831 //! \return Received byte at Master end.
832 //
833 //*****************************************************************************
834 extern uint8_t EUSCI_B_I2C_masterReceiveMultiByteNext(uint16_t baseAddress);
835 
836 //*****************************************************************************
837 //
838 //! \brief Finishes multi-byte reception at the Master end
839 //!
840 //! This function is used by the Master module to initiate completion of a
841 //! multi-byte reception. This function receives the current byte and initiates
842 //! the STOP from master to slave.
843 //!
844 //! \param baseAddress is the base address of the I2C Master module.
845 //!
846 //! Modified bits are \b UCTXSTP of \b UCBxCTLW0 register.
847 //!
848 //! \return Received byte at Master end.
849 //
850 //*****************************************************************************
851 extern uint8_t EUSCI_B_I2C_masterReceiveMultiByteFinish(uint16_t baseAddress);
852 
853 //*****************************************************************************
854 //
855 //! \brief Finishes multi-byte reception at the Master end with timeout
856 //!
857 //! This function is used by the Master module to initiate completion of a
858 //! multi-byte reception. This function receives the current byte and initiates
859 //! the STOP from master to slave.
860 //!
861 //! \param baseAddress is the base address of the I2C Master module.
862 //! \param txData is a pointer to the location to store the received byte at
863 //! master end
864 //! \param timeout is the amount of time to wait until giving up
865 //!
866 //! Modified bits are \b UCTXSTP of \b UCBxCTLW0 register.
867 //!
868 //! \return STATUS_SUCCESS or STATUS_FAILURE of the reception process
869 //
870 //*****************************************************************************
871 extern bool EUSCI_B_I2C_masterReceiveMultiByteFinishWithTimeout(uint16_t baseAddress,
872  uint8_t *txData,
873  uint32_t timeout);
874 
875 //*****************************************************************************
876 //
877 //! \brief Sends the STOP at the end of a multi-byte reception at the Master
878 //! end
879 //!
880 //! This function is used by the Master module to initiate STOP
881 //!
882 //! \param baseAddress is the base address of the I2C Master module.
883 //!
884 //! Modified bits are \b UCTXSTP of \b UCBxCTLW0 register.
885 //!
886 //! \return None
887 //
888 //*****************************************************************************
889 extern void EUSCI_B_I2C_masterReceiveMultiByteStop(uint16_t baseAddress);
890 
891 //*****************************************************************************
892 //
893 //! \brief Enables Multi Master Mode
894 //!
895 //! At the end of this function, the I2C module is still disabled till
896 //! EUSCI_B_I2C_enable is invoked
897 //!
898 //! \param baseAddress is the base address of the I2C module.
899 //!
900 //! Modified bits are \b UCSWRST and \b UCMM of \b UCBxCTLW0 register.
901 //!
902 //! \return None
903 //
904 //*****************************************************************************
905 extern void EUSCI_B_I2C_enableMultiMasterMode(uint16_t baseAddress);
906 
907 //*****************************************************************************
908 //
909 //! \brief Disables Multi Master Mode
910 //!
911 //! At the end of this function, the I2C module is still disabled till
912 //! EUSCI_B_I2C_enable is invoked
913 //!
914 //! \param baseAddress is the base address of the I2C module.
915 //!
916 //! Modified bits are \b UCSWRST and \b UCMM of \b UCBxCTLW0 register.
917 //!
918 //! \return None
919 //
920 //*****************************************************************************
921 extern void EUSCI_B_I2C_disableMultiMasterMode(uint16_t baseAddress);
922 
923 //*****************************************************************************
924 //
925 //! \brief receives a byte that has been sent to the I2C Master Module.
926 //!
927 //! This function reads a byte of data from the I2C receive data Register.
928 //!
929 //! \param baseAddress is the base address of the I2C Master module.
930 //!
931 //! \return Returns the byte received from by the I2C module, cast as an
932 //! uint8_t.
933 //
934 //*****************************************************************************
935 extern uint8_t EUSCI_B_I2C_masterReceiveSingle(uint16_t baseAddress);
936 
937 //*****************************************************************************
938 //
939 //! \brief Returns the address of the RX Buffer of the I2C for the DMA module.
940 //!
941 //! Returns the address of the I2C RX Buffer. This can be used in conjunction
942 //! with the DMA to store the received data directly to memory.
943 //!
944 //! \param baseAddress is the base address of the I2C module.
945 //!
946 //! \return The address of the I2C RX Buffer
947 //
948 //*****************************************************************************
949 extern uint32_t EUSCI_B_I2C_getReceiveBufferAddress(uint16_t baseAddress);
950 
951 //*****************************************************************************
952 //
953 //! \brief Returns the address of the TX Buffer of the I2C for the DMA module.
954 //!
955 //! Returns the address of the I2C TX Buffer. This can be used in conjunction
956 //! with the DMA to obtain transmitted data directly from memory.
957 //!
958 //! \param baseAddress is the base address of the I2C module.
959 //!
960 //! \return The address of the I2C TX Buffer
961 //
962 //*****************************************************************************
963 extern uint32_t EUSCI_B_I2C_getTransmitBufferAddress(uint16_t baseAddress);
964

966 //
967 // Mark the end of the C bindings section for C++ compilers.
968 //
969 //*****************************************************************************

971 }
972 #endif
